links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..500
prog: (PARI) a(n) = sum(k=1, n-1, gcd(k!, n!/k!)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Aug 04 2013(Haskell)a014454 n = sum $ zipWith gcd kfs $ map (div nf) kfs   where (nf:kfs) = reverse $ a166350_row n-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 11 2013
author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 12 2002
